task-wr.title: Changing the DNS Server Configuration
task-wr.shortdesc: You can change the DNS servers defined for HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade at any time after installation.

context.p: During software installation, HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade is configured with up to two DNS server IP addresses. You change these addresses using the web administration interface or the CLI.

step.cmd: In the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade web administration interface, open the System Configuration pane.

info.p: The System Configuration pane is available from the System Panel section of the Admin menu.

stepresult.p: The DNS page appears, showing the currently defined DNS servers and their IP addresses.
The Edit DNS dialog box appears.

step.cmd: Replace the DNS Server IP addresses with different ones as required.

result.p: Upon completion of the DNS configuration change, a 250.001 Configuration out-of-date alarm is raised temporarily, and then cleared automatically by the system.
